brochureSubtitle: Your premier choice for accommodation and event facilities at {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} offers a wide range of well-maintained dormitory rooms and versatile halls/meeting sections suitable for various events, trainings, and conferences. Our commitment is to provide quality service and a conducive environment for all our guests and clients.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure and well-equipped rooms for individuals, students, and trainees.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious halls and adaptable meeting sections for conferences, workshops, and events.
brochureCateringDesc: Various catering options (lunch, refreshment) available for facility bookings to suit your event needs.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and more to ensure a comfortable and productive stay/event.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff providing excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and guest satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We look forward to hosting you. Contact us for more information or proceed to book your desired service online.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer in use. Payment proof is now submitted via Telegram as per the instructions on the payment details page.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your desired dates using the calendar, and available rooms will be displayed. Click 'Book Now' on your chosen room, then fill in the booking form with your personal details and payment transfer information. After submitting, you will receive instructions to make a bank transfer and send your proof of payment via Telegram to @OROTRAIN, including your Booking ID and phone number.
faqQ2Title: How do I book a hall or meeting section?
faqQ2Answer: Booking halls or meeting sections is available for registered and approved companies. First, ensure your company is registered and approved by our admin team. Then, go to the 'Halls & Sections' page, select your desired dates and filter by facility type if needed. Choose one or more available facilities, click 'Book Selected Items', and complete the booking form. Your company representative must be logged in to complete this process.
faqQ3Title: What are the payment methods for dormitory bookings?
faqQ3Answer: For dormitory bookings, payment is made via bank transfer to our Commercial Bank of Ethiopia account. The specific account details (Account Name: Oromia Education Training Center, Account Number: 1000123456789) will be provided on the booking and payment details pages. After making the transfer, you must send proof of payment (e.g., a screenshot or bank receipt) along with your Booking ID and the phone number used for booking via Telegram to our bot: @OROTRAIN.
faqQ4Title: How do I register my company to book facilities?
faqQ4Answer: To register your company, click on the 'Register Company' link, typically found in the website's main header or near the login section. You'll need to fill out a form with your company's details. Once submitted, your registration will be reviewed by our admin team. You will be notified upon approval, after which your company representative can log in and book facilities.
faqQ5Title: What if no dormitories or halls are shown for my selected dates?
faqQ5Answer: If no items are displayed after selecting your dates, it means all available dormitories or facilities are booked for that period, or none match your filter criteria. Please try selecting different dates, or if you're looking for facilities, try adjusting the type filter (e.g., 'Halls Only' or 'Sections Only'). If you continue to have trouble, feel free to contact us for assistance.
faqQ6Title: How do I get the keys for my dormitory room after booking?
faqQ6Answer: Once your dormitory booking is approved (after payment verification), you will need to coordinate with the designated keyholder at the Oromia Education Training Center for key pickup. Your booking details, including your name, room number, and booking dates, will be available to them to facilitate the handover.
faqQ7Title: Can I book multiple halls or sections for different date ranges in a single booking request?
faqQ7Answer: No. If you need to book multiple facilities (halls or sections) for different date ranges, you must make separate booking requests for each distinct date range. A single booking request covers all selected items only for the *same* start and end dates chosen during that booking process.
